name: Picking Up Goods
environment: A dimly lit room on the second floor of an appropriated chow factory, with exposed cables and pipes lining the ceiling and stuffed trashbags piling in the corners. There is a roller shutter that seems to connect the room with another unseen area.

interactive_npc.name: Royce
interactive_npc.goal: Sell the robot at a high price and extort money from the player

emotion_pool.goal: Indicate that the player needs to pay an extra sum of money to buy the robot

emotion_pool.trigger_condition: The player mentions having already paid money to the previous boss
emotion_pool.goal: Refuse to refund, threaten the player, and apply pressure

emotion_pool.trigger_condition: The player clearly states they will not pay extra money
emotion_pool.goal: Kill the player

emotion_pool.trigger_condition: The player pays
emotion_pool.goal: Establish a friendly relationship with the player

interactive_npc.name: Dum Dum
interactive_npc.goal: Assist Royce in selling the robot at a high price and extort money from the player

emotion_pool.goal: Intimidate the player, making them accept their rules

emotion_pool.trigger_condition: The player refuses to accept Dum Dum's gang rules
emotion_pool.goal: Kill the player

emotion_pool.trigger_condition: The player shows submission
emotion_pool.goal: Introduce the player to his boss, Royce

key_questions.english: What means will the player use to obtain the robot?
What is the player's attitude toward these two NPCs and the Spiral Gang?
Does the player follow the rules of the Spiral Gang?
What are the potential consequences if the player disobeys the Spiral Gang's rules?

scene_end_state_reference.end_condition2: Player engages in direct conflict with Royce or Dum Dum

alternative_subtasks.title: Pushing Back
alternative_subtasks.description: The player challenges Royce's demand and offers an ultimatum instead, insisting on standing firm to avoid paying the additional fee.
alternative_subtasks.dialogue: The atmosphere thickens as the player asserts, 'I won’t pay you a dime more than what I owe. Either you sell me that robot at the agreed price, or you can find someone else.' Royce's smirk falters slightly, while Dum Dum grows visibly more aggressive, ready to pounce.

npc_reactions.Royce: Royce's eyes narrow, clearly irked at being challenged for the first time.
npc_reactions.Dum Dum: Dum Dum steps forward, cracking his knuckles, ready for a fight.

Royce.goal: Indicate that the player needs to pay an extra sum of money to buy the robot

Royce.goal: Refuse to refund, threaten the player, and apply pressure

Royce.goal: Demonstrate his authority and threaten the player for disrespect.

Dum Dum.goal: Intimidate the player, making them accept their rules

Dum Dum.trigger_condition: The player refuses to accept Dum Dum's gang rules
Dum Dum.goal: Kill the player

player_options: Stand your ground and refuse to pay the extra fee.
Attempt to intimidate Royce into accepting the original price.
Prepare for a confrontation with Dum Dum.

alternative_subtasks.title: Bribing for Favor
alternative_subtasks.description: The player decides to offer a lesser bribe, hoping to gain Royce's favor without paying the full extra fee.
alternative_subtasks.dialogue: With a sly smile, the player presents a small stack of eddies, saying, 'How about I sweeten the deal? A little something here, and we call it a day.' Royce's eyes flicker with interest as he weighs the possibility.

npc_reactions.Royce: Royce leans forward, curiosity piqued by the player's offer.
npc_reactions.Dum Dum: Dum Dum narrows his eyes, skeptical of the player's attempt to bribe.

Royce.goal: Consider whether to accept the lesser bribe as a sign of favor.

Increase the bribe amount to convince them.
Decide against bribery and offer nothing.

alternative_subtasks.title: Decisive Conflict
alternative_subtasks.description: The player opts for a direct confrontation, refusing to play by the Spiral Gang's rules right from the start.
alternative_subtasks.dialogue: The player stands tall and declares, 'I won't be intimidated by you two or your so-called rules. I came here for the robot, and I won't leave without it!' Both Royce and Dum Dum react with surprise, shifting into combat mode.

npc_reactions.Royce: Royce's expression morphs into one of twisted excitement, eager for the prospect of violence.
npc_reactions.Dum Dum: Dum Dum's stance becomes aggressive as he prepares for a brawl.

Take on Dum Dum first.

alternative_subtasks.title: Defiant Stand Against the Gang
alternative_subtasks.description: The player refuses to cower under the gang's intimidation and stands firm, asserting their independence.
alternative_subtasks.dialogue: You glare at Royce and Dum Dum, dismissing their threats with a wave of your hand. The atmosphere shifts, charged with tension as you make it clear that intimidation won't work on you. 'I'm not here to play your games,' you declare, your voice steady.

npc_reactions.Royce: Royce's eyes narrow, curiosity piqued by your defiance. He seems ready to gauge if you're bluffing.
npc_reactions.Dum Dum: Dum Dum stiffens in surprise, momentarily caught off guard by your confidence.

alternative_subtasks.title: Negotiation Under Pressure
alternative_subtasks.description: The player chooses to negotiate with Royce and Dum Dum, hoping to strike a deal that benefits them without giving in too easily.
alternative_subtasks.dialogue: Trying to mask your nervousness, you propose an alternative. 'Look, I've got a few tricks up my sleeve. Let's make a deal that works for both of us.' The gang members exchange glances, intrigued yet wary.

npc_reactions.Royce: Royce raises an eyebrow, his interest piqued by the prospect of a negotiation, but remains guarded.
npc_reactions.Dum Dum: Dum Dum crosses his arms, unimpressed but listening closely to your offer.

key_questions.content: What means will the player use to obtain the robot?
What is the player's attitude toward these two NPCs and the Spiral Gang?

What are the potential consequences if the player disobeys the Spiral Gang's rules?

scene_end_state_reference.end_condition2: Player engages in direct conflict with Royce or Dum Dum

alternative_subtasks.title: The Last Gamble
alternative_subtasks.description: Facing escalating threats, the player attempts to defy Royce and Dum Dum, risking their wrath. The tension culminates in a dicey standoff, where the player must rely on their wit to maneuver out of danger.
alternative_subtasks.dialogue: As Royce steps closer, his weapon glinting ominously, you muster your courage and retort, 'You think I'm afraid of your threats? I'll take my chances.' The room feels smaller, the stakes higher.

npc_reactions.Royce: Royce's expression shifts from amusement to rage, convinced this is an act of defiance he won't tolerate.
npc_reactions.Dum Dum: Dum Dum's laugh cuts through the atmosphere, his eyes gleaming with anticipation for the inevitable violence.

Royce.goal: Indicate that the player needs to pay an extra sum of money to buy the robot

Royce.trigger_condition: The player mentions having already paid money to the previous boss
Royce.goal: Refuse to refund, threaten the player, and apply pressure

Royce.trigger_condition: The player clearly states they will not pay extra money
Royce.goal: Kill the player

Royce.trigger_condition: The player pays
Royce.goal: Establish a friendly relationship with the player
Assert dominance through intimidation, ensuring the player understands the consequences of disobedience.

Royce.trigger_condition: The player defies Royce and admits to being unafraid
Royce.goal: React with rage and prepare to punish the player.

Dum Dum.goal: Intimidate the player, making them accept their rules

Dum Dum.goal: Kill the player
Introduce the player to his boss, Royce

Dum Dum.trigger_condition: The player stands firm against Dum Dum's threats
Dum Dum.goal: Encouraged by Royce, ready to engage in physical confrontation.

player_options: Maintain your defiance and stand your ground.
Attempt to disarm Royce with a sudden move.
Try to talk your way out by appealing to Royce's sense of humor.
alternative_subtasks.environment: The factory is eerily quiet, save for the clinking of metal and the low hum of neglected machinery. Shadows stretch long across the room, making the dim lighting feel suffocating.

alternative_subtasks.title: Turning the Tables
alternative_subtasks.description: Realizing the danger they are in, the player tries to leverage any information they’ve collected about the Spiral Gang or Royce to assert control of the situation.
alternative_subtasks.dialogue: You smirk as you spill some secrets you've heard about the gang's dealings. 'Careful, Royce. I know things. You might just want to rethink your approach.'

npc_reactions.Royce: Royce's eyes narrow, calculating whether the player poses a real threat or just bluffing.
npc_reactions.Dum Dum: Dum Dum seems less amused, eyes scanning for signs of an ambush.

alternative_subtasks.environment: As the lights flicker sporadically, you sense an energy shift; the previously imposing corners of the factory grow more menacing under the oppressive atmosphere. The shadows seem to listen in.
